attributes.review: IM KAREN AND MY DAUGHTER DECIDED TO DOWNLOAD THIS FOR FUN.THEN SHE DECIDED TO OPEN THE APP AND GOT SCARRED FOR LIFE!!!!!THE THING THAT FIRST CAME UP WAS MUSTY CRUSTY DUSTY AND UGLY.I TOLD MY DAUGHTER  I WAS GOING TO WRITE A BAD REVIEW.AND I DID WHAT I DID AND I SAID WHAT I SAID
attributes.title: OMG WHY

attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to get a little bit orange yk (because my local tan shop wasn’t giving me the wanted look) and I was thoroughly disappointed. Instead of giving me the orange look, I was immediately introduced to a virus on my iPhone. I had to go take it to the Apple store🤬🤬😡😡and they traced the virus back to the Trump app. It had hacked into my info and taken all of my personal information.😱😨😰😥😓I was very scared and on top of all of this, I didn’t even GET an orange tan. Instead I was left with pale, disgusting skin.😢😤😫It was very hard for me to process and left me upset and just genuinely upset.😑😑And to top THAT all off, trump is paying people to leave good reviews by using spam bots. ITS RIDICULOUS!!!! I just know these people didn’t actually get good orange tans.🤬🤬🤬This app is discriminatory, and I don’t recommend getting. Also trump is trying to get tik tok taken down just because he’s mad that his own app isn’t working. I’m sorry Donald ass, but it’s not MY fault ur app isn’t working luv.🥰💅🏻✨When I tried to order merch so I could burn it to match my aesthetic (last week I burned the American flag, and this week it’s the trump one.) It didn’t even come!!!!! So now I have 65,000$ worth of stuff in my cart and I can’t even pay for it because I have to cut my hamsters toenails😾😾😾✨✨. Anyways don’t buy this app!!!!!
attributes.title: Terrible😾😔And Scary😟😖😣

attributes.review: I started to finally realize how ✨special✨ our president and his followers are. Basically like Hitler and the nazi's. But the app took 2 1/2 hours to download, and then crashed multiple times when I tried to use it. I was thinking, what in the chicken on a stick? I started to get irritated because I knew, that orange peel of a man is why. He's toxic and he is crashing my phone. How disgraceful of you to create a poop app !!
attributes.title: Horrible😡🤬

attributes.review: I was using this app one day and it completely shut my phone off so I put it down and waited for it to turn back on randomly I turned around to get the phone and I noticed my phone disappeared only to realize to it was shoved sooo far up my butt that I had to go to the emergency room and get it surgically removed

attributes.review: 🧚disgusting ✨ it keeps crashing my phone and asking for my location of my last poop, that behavior is un- acceptable! All I see are pictures of 🌈oranges🌸 I don’t know why people are so obsessed with 🌷oranges 🌹 I don’t like the app overall it is very boring. Needs some mini games or at least those adds where they let you play the little game. In conclusion I don’t like the app and many people agree. It does NOT educate me or others on ANYTHING very very very boring no big brain 🧠. Somebody needs so save Barron from Trump, he is very expresso-depresso boy. He need help. I deleted the app as soon as I took a quick look at it and it was the right decision to delete it, this concludes my presentation thank you for coming I now have to continue my doody on the potty 🚽.
